name: solidtime
description: Solidtime is a self-hosted time tracking solution focused on team productivity. It provides timesheets, reports, and project-based tracking through a modern, responsive web UI.
features: Time tracking: Logs work hours with start/stop timers or manual entries.
Project management: Organizes time entries by projects and tasks.
Team tracking: Monitors team member hours and productivity.
Billable hours: Marks time as billable or non-billable for client invoicing.
Reporting: Generates detailed reports on time spent by project, user, or period.
Calendar view: Visualizes time entries in calendar format for easy review.
Export data: Downloads time data as CSV or Excel for external analysis.
Client portal: Allows clients to view time spent on their projects.
Budget tracking: Sets project budgets and tracks time against estimates.
Integrations: Connects with invoicing and project management tools.
Mobile apps: Tracks time on the go with iOS and Android applications.
API access: Automates time tracking via REST API.
